name: Best Buy Top Deals Page
description: This feature deals with the Top Deals functionality.

elements.name: test compare functionality with valid data

steps.name: Top Deals functionality should be availble
i click on Top Deals link
should display Top Deals page
should click on Computer & Tablet Deals
should click on Laptops
should display Laptop Deals
User Laptop Deals page should scroll to Featured deals
i click on save option for first laptop
click on save option for second laptop
scroll up to click on Saved Items
click on See all your saved items
Saved Items Page should be open
i select First checkbox of first Laptop 0 1
select second checkbox of second Laptop 0 1
click on Compare button
